TEXT.TITLE: SCOTT'S HOSPITALITY ACQUIRES CAPITAL FOOD
TEXT.BODY: <Scott's Hospitality Inc> said it acquired Capital Food Services Ltd, Ottawa's largest catering and food service company, for undisclosed terms. Scott's said it would operate Capital Food as a separate unit under Capital's current name and management. Reuter
